name: SWATCH (Eustak, GerardClotet, Sebi-Lopez, Nadine_044, JaumeMontagut)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

The Swatch is a puzzle game made during the GDSG Intrinsic Jam 2020.

The game takes place in an abstract world made of only of 6 colors. You'll have to think deeply and understand how this world works to make your own way to the end!

INSTRUCTIONS:
  • WASD: Player Movement
  • Cursor: Player orientation & rotation
  • Left Click: Hit cube
  • Right Click: Grab cube
  • R: Restart the level (if you want go to the intial state of the puzzle or you suspect there's a bug)
GAMEPLAY: SPOILER:

It's based mainly in a  swap color mechanic where the player has to hit the cubes to change his color. All the cubes must match in a same color to accomplish each one of the levels until the win.

Note that each cube can be connected amongst another/s with different sort of linkers that apply a different color propagation effect.
